
== Single Letter Aliases ==
Alias the following commonly used commands to one letter:
- `ls` -> `l`
- `cd` -> `c`
- `git` -> `g`
- `vim` -> `v`
- `docker` -> `d`

== Combinational Commands ==
Some commands are commonly ran one after each other, here are some aliases that combine two commands
- `mkdir <DIR> && cd <DIR>` -> `mkcd <DIR>`
- `cd <DIR> && ls` -> `cl <DIR>`

== Program Flags ==
Some commands are commonly ran with a specific flag:
- `ls -a` -> `la`
